name: Kids Climbing Trees
description: Arguing with your friends? Things about to get out of hand? Instead of duking it out settle it with a classic game! Welcome to Kids Climbing Trees, a multiplayer platformer that combines a lighthearted aesthetic with engaging and competitive gameplay. See who’s the fastest out of all your friends while you all race to the top. Impress your friends with how skilled and creative you can be while you speed your way through uniquely crafted levels that challenge your timing and button pressing skills. Use the dynamic game mechanics to jump and climb your way up. Make use of wall jumps, ropes, and shaky platforms to get by.
